Question: This person turned to Brill and Jones to further his ambition to spread the psychoanalytic cause in the English-speaking world.
Hints: This person began smoking tobacco at age 24; initially a cigarette smoker, he became a cigar smoker.
They also found limited and equivocal support for this person's theories about the development of homosexuality.
Firestone interprets this personian "metaphors" in terms of the literal facts of power within the family.
